keyword: how many calories are in a tater tot
title: How Many Calories Are in a Tater Tot?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a tater tot, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and variations for baked or fried prep.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Tater Tot?
assumptions: Standard frozen tater tot (~20 g each), oven-baked per package instructions, no added oil or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, preparation method (baked vs. fried), and serving size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard tater tot has about 55 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Deep-fried in oil instead of baked
Homemade with less potato, more veggies

faqs.q: How many calories are in a tater tot?
faqs.a: Approximately 55 kcal for one standard baked tater tot.

faqs.q: Are tater tots high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 7.2 g carbs per tater tot, mainly from potatoes.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in one tater tot?
faqs.a: Around 120 mg, which can add up with multiple servings.
Minimal, only about 0.7 g per tater tot.

faqs.q: Baked vs. fried tater tots calories?
faqs.a: Baked is lower (~55 kcal); fried adds ~15 kcal from absorbed oil.
